medical_history.chief_complaint: Referral to the Diabetes Prevention Clinic due to history of prediabetes and discordance between HbA1c and glucose levels.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's prediabetes was noted from 2013 with HbA1c levels fluctuating between 5.7-6.4% up to 2016. During this time, a slight elevation in fasting serum glucose (102 mg/dl) was recorded, and subsequent monitoring showed an increase in HbA1c levels to the diabetes range (>6.5%) thereafter.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension and hyperlipidemia treated with lisinopril (5 mg) and atorvastatin (40 mg), respectively. No known family history of diabetes.
medical_history.social_history: The patient follows an unrestricted diet and engages in minimal physical exercise, primarily due to lower back degenerative disc disease.
